name: Verus Event Management IT Solutions
tag_list: event-management, abstract-management, software, registration-software, online-abstract, online-registration
overview:
Since 1998 VERUS is developing different solutions and services that can respond to the most complex needs of every client.

VERUS produces innovative solutions and services that vary from event management to content management, from business solutions to web solutions in different areas of information technology. We approach each complex case with technological experience and infinite client satisfaction commitment.

Through a continuously growing IT infrastructure, the solutions we develop provide all successful results needed in order to create a platform for clients where we can serve their own customers at a higher level and gain better partnership opportunities with institutions.
